content.rendered:
Attorney Positions

SwiftPost Attorneys is one of the oldest law firms in Stockholm. Each of our attorneys focus their efforts in specific areas of law allowing them to develop a thorough understanding and expertise in each of their areas, however as a firm we all consult with each other on cases that will inevitably involve the expertise of another attorney in our firm. We offer a friendly family oriented atmosphere and the flexibility for you to develop your skills in a specific area without sacrificing your personal and family relationships. We provide our attorneys and assistants with the best technology available to ensure that they have the tools to efficiently and accurately fulfill their obligations to our clients.

The goal of our firm is to establish a team to assist our clients in each of our areas of law. The team will, at the minimum, consist of a lead attorney, legal assistant and/or legal secretary. In addition we have support assistants and administrators to complete the smooth operation of our business.

If your experience is in other areas of law, please feel free to contact us regarding employment. Considerable experience in other areas of law may qualify you for one of the available positions. Please send your resume by e-mail, fax, or regular mail to:

Engelbrektsgatan 23,
114 32 Stockholm, Sweden

+1 210-960-1388

+1 210-960-1388

Contact us via email.

We are always interested in communicating with qualified attorneys and assistants. If you would like to explore the possibility of joining our team please select from the following categories:

Attorney Positions

We periodically have additional openings for attorneys to join our firm as associates or members. Normal requirements for attorneys are a minimum of three years experience in the practice area in question. Stockholm Bar and Oregon Bar is preferred. We expect all of our attorneys to not only be proficient in the area of practice but to be extremely professional and ethical in every aspect.

Assistant Positions

The goal of our firm is to establish a team to assist our clients in each of our areas of law. The team will, at the minimum, consist of a lead attorney, legal assistant and legal secretary. In addition we have support assistants and administrators to complete the smooth operation of our business. No positions are available at this time.

Administrative Support

No positions are available at this time.
